clearcontrol.core.device.openclose

Interface ReOpenDeviceInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CameraDeviceInterface, StackCameraDeviceInterface<Q>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CameraDeviceBase, HamStackCamera, StackCameraDeviceBase, StackCameraDeviceSimulator

    public interface ReOpenDeviceInterface
    ReOpen Device Interface. Certain devices require to be reopened when certain configuration/parameters changes are applied to them.
    Author:
    royer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearReOpen()
      Clears re-open flag
      boolean isReOpenDeviceNeeded()
      Returns true if this device requires to be reopened.
      void reopen()
      Reopens device
      void requestReOpen()
      Requests this device to reopen.

    • Method Detail

      • isReOpenDeviceNeeded

        boolean isReOpenDeviceNeeded()
        Returns true if this device requires to be reopened.
        Returns:
        true if reopen necessary, false otherwise

      • requestReOpen

        void requestReOpen()
        Requests this device to reopen.

      • clearReOpen

        void clearReOpen()
        Clears re-open flag

      • reopen

        void reopen()
        Reopens device
